lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: my son taught me that you CAN make a difference, one person, one loan, at a time.

lender.name: melvin
lender.loan_because: tenemos que unirno para alludar a nuestros hermanos de haiti

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities to those who could use a hand up

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: Dr. Henry Garazo is a board certified plastic surgeon, dedicated to providing excellent patient care in a warm, safe, relaxed environment. Dr. Garazo performs numerous plastic surgery procedures, specializing in breast augmentation and tummy tucks.
lender.occupational_info: Dr. Henry Garazo is a board certified plastic surgeon, dedicated to providing excellent patient care in a warm, safe, relaxed environment. Dr. Garazo performs numerous plastic surgery procedures, specializing in breast augmentation and tummy tucks.

lender.name: Rainer
lender.loan_because: It`s important to support those who wants improve theirs sitation by theirs own efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I help old people to accomplish their daily life, so that they can stay at home and must not spent theirs last years in a foster home.

lender.name: nicole
lender.loan_because: I believe in enabling hard working women around the work to get ahead.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.occupation: Long distance trucker and network marketer

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help from time to time. I am grateful I can help people live better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I create designs for companies and individuals to help their businesses grow and run smoothly.

lender.name: Ola
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have enough money to live, and I believe that what I earn is not only for me, but for the benefit of many.

lender.name: Gabriela
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves

lender.name: Jeffery
lender.loan_because: I do want to make a difference in the world, and in doing so, maybe put someone else in a position to help another person in the future.
lender.occupational_info: My current work position is tedious and, on occasion, frustrating, but am looking to improve myself with education and advancement.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping other people.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.occupational_info: I go to school full time

lender.name: Kiel
lender.loan_because: "Sometimes it takes money to make money."

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to achieve their dreams and create a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in New York City for Mayor Bloomberg's office in the criminal justice department. I work on projects for immigration reform, making schools safer, giving people fair trials in court and DNA collection for convicts.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: to help someone else

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: We have come a long way since the beginning of human history, but we still have a long way to go. Individuals around the world are all capable of becoming successful, and equal opportunities must be given in order for that to happen. I am only one person in a world of many, but as a whole, our whispers become deafening screams. With these small steps I take, the world can make giant leaps.
lender.occupational_info: I am student, an amateur photographer, poet, and artist.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It is the simplest, most direct way to make a tangible impact on others' lives. Connecting with folks around the world not only brings us closer together, but adds meaning to our lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a public university helping students achieve their dreams of becoming successful engineers, computer scientists, and teachers.

lender.name: Raquel
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals and support their families
lender.occupational_info: I check people in and out of The Fountains Resort, here in sunny Orlando, Florida

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: it makes more sense to invest my money in people than in banks.
lender.occupational_info: I do Facebook and other social media communications for the University of St.Gallen.

lender.name: baxter
lender.loan_because: it is hard to work and raise a family. We need to help each other as we can.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: i can. I live in an affluent suburb, and with money and my computer, I'm able to help.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others in a way that I was never helped.
lender.occupational_info: I make specialty jewelry pieces for the discriminating buyer.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in school to become a registered nurse. I want to be able to give back to my community.

lender.name: Scott & Katie
lender.loan_because: Security propagates peace.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a wonderful idea! They provide a way for people to connect all over the world. If my $ can be put to use by someone that can make much more of it than I can, I am happy to loan it. It benefits everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare and print images onto all kinds of media using large format digital printers. My company produces graphics for a variety of purposes, like retail display, banners, vehicles, wallpaper, signs and museum displays.

lender.name: Lindsay & Craig
lender.loan_because: its fun making a difference

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I believe in working hard and earning my own way in life. So do the people I loan to!
lender.occupational_info: I write romance books

lender.name: Anoop
lender.loan_because: I believe capitalism works much better than charity when it comes to lifting people out of poverty

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I'm very grateful for what I have and I'd like to help someone else.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Hard work should pay off, and hard work pays better when folks have the equipment they need or some money to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and test cameras. I am also a graduate student, and for fun I build things in my spare time.

lender.name: Sara S K
lender.loan_because:
I want to help someone make a difference in their lives. Hopefully that will help their family and their local economy.
I can't imagine what the world would be like if there were no local, regional, or global projects like this.

lender.name: Zebulon
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Dave & Sarah
lender.loan_because: We want to help others get a headstart.
lender.occupational_info: Dave works in media and Sarah works in libraries.

lender.name: Verna
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves.

lender.name: The Rotary Club of Charlottetown Royalty
Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I have the resources to give and make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Wendell
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others; it is nice to be able to direct my support to individuals I can relate to.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I believe small business brings big change, both to entrepreneurial individuals and the communities they live and work in.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small online publishing business.

lender.name: Josh Hon
lender.loan_because: As I've learned the hard way, it takes money to make money. The poor often aren't lacking for willingness to work, but lack the access to capital to start.
lender.occupational_info: I help design, manufacture, and market bicycles.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I can actually make a difference.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: there are so many talented and hard-working people in the world that deserve to be successful.We're all part of the human race, so we all need to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an advertising company as a manager. I also have my own small business sewing children's clothing.

lender.name: Jim & Karen
lender.loan_because: We were given a gift certificate for Christmas. A great idea!

lender.name: Sam Ellens
lender.loan_because: Microfinance beats grants, hands down.

lender.name: Ayami
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give and help someone else when I can.

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: I want to help in whatever small way I can. I wish everyone would a little.... it makes such a difference for so many !

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: I want to live in a World where we help eachother instead of squander over material objects.
lender.occupational_info: I sell groceries. Plain and simple.

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: I'm excited about the idea of giving women chances to be entrepreneurs so that they may empower themselves, educate their children, and improve their communities.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to find creative ways to provide more options to those with very few.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I too work for myself and I know how important cash flow can be. I am keen to support fellow workers whose countries are not as rich as mine.
lender.occupational_info: Family therapists talk to family members all together in a same room when someone is distressed or ill or in trouble. We try to ensure everyone has a chance to be heard, and assist the family to come up with fresh solutions to problems.

lender.name: Maximo
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing and through my limited resources I can still find a way to help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of life and a brother to all.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others, Who are trying to improve the standard of living for themselves and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a highly trained Retail Manager and working with people is my specialty. I manage 30 Employee's and every year I chose to help my people if I could when money problems occurred and they had no one else to turn to. I see Kiva as a way I can have a small impact on the world in the same way.

lender.name: Wendi
lender.loan_because: I believe eveyone who can, should! Too many get discouraged when they discover they can't solve all the world's problems. Don't do nothing simply because you can't do everything! Your generosity and good will matter, even if only to a few.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I am more blessed than I deserve. Others need help in so many ways.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse in a hospital intensive care unit.

lender.name: Mathew
lender.loan_because: it is something I can do to make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm looking to get my Master's degree in Public Administration so i can help make government run better.

lender.name: adam
lender.whereabouts: The People's Republic of Portland OR

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: There is always someone who needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to international students.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: "He has showed you, O man, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God." Micah 6:8

lender.name: Giehl Advisory Fund
lender.loan_because: As an advisory, when searching for someone to lend to, we believe that there are a few essential requirements necessary for the person to posses.
lender.occupational_info: This is a teacher and students based team!

lender.name: Georgia
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Kathie
lender.occupational_info: I teach computers at an international school in Hong Kong. My studetns are ages 5-11 years old.

lender.name: NikoAndTeresa
lender.loan_because: I don't think because I was born in a place that gave me opportunities that I deserve them more than the people here
lender.occupational_info: I create programs for computers and the internet. I also help with a travel website

lender.name: Marsh Family
lender.loan_because: The extended Marsh family decided to use some of the money for Christmas presents to try and make a difference to others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We cover ages from 68 to 2 years with retirerees, rehab advisor, midwife, freight, mining and office managers and school children in Australia and a language school manager in Japan.

lender.name: Innovation Factory
lender.loan_because: Here at Innovation Factory we know that in times of crisis, investment in innovation is crucial. Its the first step in preparing for a brighter future. We also know how closely linked innovation is to entrepreneurship, and how important entrepreneurs are in helping people improve their lives. The critical element is providing the financial support for people with ideas. So, we believe, investing in entrepreneurs in developing countries around the globe will help fight poverty by providing crucial financial support for that innovative spark.

lender.name: Gustaf-Wilhelm
lender.loan_because: I am entrepreneur my self and I would like to help others and I believe in helping other by giving them the means to help themselves. To be able to succeed you need to be willing to work for it! Success comes after hard work. Success is about getting up one time more than you fall down.

lender.name: Bronwyn
lender.loan_because: I want my life to be worthwhile.

lender.name: Helma
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the freedom I have to create my own business born from a passion to bring forth something of beauty. I have learned so much as a self-employed person; feeling rich in the experiences gained along the way. I know what hard work is, and feel privileged to be able to pay forward to someone else who has their own vision to create something of value in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I design and produce a collection of jewelry handmade in the US of A.

lender.name: christopher
lender.occupational_info: I work for the local government in my area.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than I, while still having the opportunity to get the money back after the help has been given. I never plan to take the money I'm paid back out of Kiva, but rather to keep loaning it away again.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers do what people want them to do.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: We are all part of the same world. I believe that we all have value; no matter where we are from, or how much we make in a year, or how educated we are, etc...and we should all try to help eachother whenever we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am student in university studying TESOL (teaching english as a second language). I love working with people from around the world--learning about their languages, cultures, and dreams while helping them with their questions about my language and my culture.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.occupational_info: I am a student currently enrolled in the Master of Business, Entrepreneurship and Technology program at the University of Waterloo. I enjoy exploring ideas, traveling and learning about new cultures.

lender.name: Janaki
lender.occupational_info: working hard on the human and cattle microbiome!

lender.name: Daniel & Ginny
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care about people and the fact that they're working hard to provide for their families.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: To the countries and peoples who were so welcoming on my South American travels

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people that want to better their lives and the lives of their families. I wish I could do more , but for now, I hope this helps.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to seniors (people over 62) that enables them to live in their home through their retirement years more comfortably.Some use it for medications, some use it to supplement their basic needs and some use it to travel or reinvest in other opportunities.

lender.name: Diego
lender.occupational_info: I was born in Per. Left to do an internship in Italy, 10 years have passed since then. From Pisa I moved to Madrid where I currently live. I work for an Italian software house maintaining real time trading platforms for financial institutions.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'm a teacher and my students want to make a difference in the world. These loans are possible thanks to them.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software engineer. I develop and maintain computer programs for Thomas Cook.

lender.name: Allene
lender.loan_because: I care, and Kiva provides a powerful and sustainable way to empower individuals to begin to lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other to improve our world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of animals that need short term medical care.

lender.name: atam van basten
lender.loan_because: i want to be bisnisman..........
lender.occupational_info: very happy with my work.........

lender.name: Elli Jo
lender.loan_because: My dad reads stories & we talk about who I would like to loan money to help out.

lender.name: Anna
lender.occupational_info: I currently go to school to become a history teacher, but I also am a sales rep for a locally owned business to pay for my schooling.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the best way to encourage economic growth in developing communities.
lender.occupational_info: I design and test new parts/assemblies for aerospace projects. I'm also an inventor and design new technology to aid third-world infrastructure development.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to have such a wonderful life, and would like to help others achieve their goals. "We make a living by what we do, but we make a life by what we give."
lender.occupational_info: I help people stay physically fit with exercise to keep them healthy and improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving everyone in the world a chance to be successful. There is so much talent in the world but without the means to nurture such talent it often goes unnoticed and dreams go unfulfilled....I feel Kiva helps us support all the talent and ideas of the wonderful applicants for these loans!! I hope I can help make someones dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse and I specialize in taking care of children with special needs and disabilities. I believe everyone deserves to reach their full potential!!

lender.name: Krishna Chaitanya
lender.loan_because: i have no working capital to run my business. basically my business is a wireless internet service provider. and it takes USD 4000 per month for maintainance. i have no funds for maintainance and to purchase new products for giving further connections. my friend said about this organization as i got fed up by trying loans from outside. i would be really helpfull if anyone can help me in this regard. i can repay the amount after 10 months and within 18 months.
lender.occupational_info: This is basically a wireless internet service provider. we give internet connections across the city through the latest wireless technology which doesnt require any wire.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: Ministry

lender.name: Ronke
lender.loan_because: God has enabled me to

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: it makes a positive difference to those less fortunate than myself and i am able to help those people.

lender.name: catherine
lender.loan_because: We should all extend a hand to those that are working hard and deserve a chance to improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: I work for a health organization, the Veteran administration caring for solders that are ill.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I know what a big difference a small amount of money can make.
lender.occupational_info: I write for a coffee company about coffee farmers, and how choosing Fair Trade coffee can make a difference for thousands of farmers around the world.

lender.name: Mika
lender.loan_because: I am cool.

lender.name: Duncan Troy
lender.loan_because: I am keen to give people the chance to work for a better quality of life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I supply, host and maintain the technology platform to run lotteries entered via mobile phone.

lender.name: Windstar Cruises
lender.loan_because: Windstar Cruises supports KIVA's work in alleviating poverty through small business micro-lending. We invite past and future Windstar guests to connect through this team and join us in supporting KIVA entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Windstar Cruises operates three sailing yachts WInd Spirit, Wind Star and Wind Surf. They are known for their pampering without pretense and their ability to visit the hidden harbors and secluded coves of the worlds most treasured destinations. Carrying just 148 to 312 guests, the luxurious ships of Windstar cruise to nearly 50 nations, calling at 100 ports throughout Europe, the Caribbean and the Americas. For more information including brochures, rates and itineraries contact a professional travel agent or call Windstar at 1-800-258-7245. Visit Windstar Cruises online at www.windstarcruises.com.

lender.name: Fleet
lender.loan_because: We sell used cars and trucks below book value - We take trade-ins, and provide auto financing and auto service.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: Small businesses are the back bone of any good economy. Allowing those who normally wouldn't be able to borrow helps to support and strengthen local families, communities and international awareness.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: it is nice. I do my part for non human sentient life. this allows me to help human sentient life too.
lender.occupational_info: learnin'

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of women and children across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I teach liberal studies classes (mythology, anthropology, creative writing, world civilizations, English) to college students at the Art Institute of Las Vegas.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I try and add money to my Kiva account monthly instead of spending on useless shit.
lender.occupational_info: Develop content driven websites that offer free services to the public, then attempt to profit from advertising.

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: I have lived abroad and seen firsthand how loans can help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a University in the international arena.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Financial Economics at Florida Atlantic University

lender.name: Tuomas
lender.loan_because: Someone needs the money (more than I do)

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I monitor the safety of kids at the Musgrave Boys & Girls Club

lender.name: Gerald & Whisper
lender.loan_because: it is the way the world should be.

lender.name: Devika
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Micro-Financing Group
lender.loan_because: We want to do big things and just because we are students does not mean we cannot start now. For what we ever wish to do with ease we must first learn to do with diligence. We want to learn the fruits of generosity.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Club on Trinity Western University campus started, operated, and growing by students

lender.name: STUDIO8 Web Design
lender.loan_because: The purpose of life is not to be happy - but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you have lived at all. ~Leo Rosten

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: We all need help, at some time in our life. I was helped, now I help. I hope we all can make a better world!
lender.occupational_info: Hard

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Studying chemistry so I can one day design new medicines.

lender.name: Helge
lender.loan_because: let love rule
lender.occupational_info: I help companies - to market their IT products and - to finish their IT projects successfully

lender.name: Dinan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to help other people

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help others across the world from me just within my own house.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It's a fast and simple way to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that my company's customers have a good supply of reliable spare parts for their food, medical, and consumer product packaging machines.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who may not be as fortunate as I have been.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lender.name: Val
lender.loan_because: Micro loans are a good way to help defeat poverty. I have met people like those I loan to and have seen what a little extra money can do for their businesses and lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach University but for not a lot of money because I am also still a student.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in the beauty of helping others. I especially believe in helping those who are helping themselves, and that's why I love this program.

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world for the better.

lender.name: Justin & Cortney
lender.loan_because: We care.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: While not wealthy, I have been blessed with an abundant life. Now's the time to pay a little back.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired university biologist and outdoor leader (backpacking and mountaineering) who now raises cattle on a Colorado ranch.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: David Hall is a senior level sales and marketing executive with over 13 years experience working with fortune 500 companies. .David is widely recognized as a leading name in the sales and marketing field locally and nationally. As company spokesman David was largely responsible for establishing Rock Financial as Michigan's most recognizable company.
